You are here: Salesforce Help > Docs > Service Cloud

Environment	The context of the problem, such as conditions, configurations, or versions.
Issue	The description of the customer’s stated problem.
Problem	The technical assessment or explanation of the issue or an underlying condition causing the issue.
Process Steps	The series of actions taken to accomplish a task within the conversation.
Questions and Answer	Quick and easy summaries of the conversation.
Resolution	The solution or outcome for the problem and conversation.
Root Cause	The sources or origins of the problem.
Summary	A synopsis of the conversation or issue.
Troubleshooting Steps	The series of actions taken to identify the problem and its root cause.
Workaround	A temporary solution to circumvent the issue or problem.
title: Understanding Einstein Knowledge Creation Response Glossary
